variables.name: DECODE
variables.comment:
* Lookup table for turning bytes into their position in the
         * Base64 alphabet.

variables.name: DECODE_WEBSAFE
variables.comment:
* Decode lookup table for the "web safe" variant (RFC 3548
         * sec. 4) where - and _ replace + and /.

variables.name: SKIP
variables.comment: Non-data values in the DECODE arrays.

methods.name: public int maxOutputSize(int len)
methods.comment:
* @return an overestimate for the number of bytes {@code
         * len} bytes could decode to.

methods.name: public boolean process(byte[] input, int offset, int len, boolean finish)
methods.comment:
* Decode another block of input data.
         *
         * @return true if the state machine is still healthy.  false if
         *         bad base-64 data has been detected in the input stream.

methodNames: public boolean process(byte[] input, int offset, int len, boolean finish)
